full_summary:
# Tender Announcement

## Solicitation Number: 5P468-22-0130/A

Parks Canada invites Design-Build (D-B) bidders to submit a proposal for the design and construction of office space at the Lake Louise Visitor Centre. The project involves designing and constructing office space, as outlined in the scope of work.

### Project Overview

- Estimated project value: $250,001 to $500,000, inclusive of taxes
- Completion deadline: January 20, 2023
- The selected bidder will be responsible for design and construction work

### Tender Requirements

- Bidders must submit a two-submission bid, as per Instructions to Bidders (IB06)
- Bid documents must be sent as email attachments, in either English or French
- The maximum email file size that Parks Canada can receive is 15 megabytes

### Important Dates

- Tender closing date: October 5, 2022, at 4:00 pm MDT
- Optional site visit: September 22, 2022, at 12:00 pm MDT (MDT)

### Contact Information

- Contracting Authority: Aarondeep Maan, email: aarondeep.maan@pc.gc.ca, phone: 403-585-7139
- Address: 30 Victoria Street, Gatineau, Quebec J8X 0B3, Canada

### Supporting Documents

- Tender documents are available on the Government Electronic Tendering Service
- Addenda, when issued, will be posted on the same website
- Documents may be submitted in either English or French

### Trade Agreements

- This tender is governed by the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

### Regions of Opportunity

- The project is located in the province of Alberta, Canada

### Pre-Qualification Requirements

- Bidders must pre-qualify with Parks Canada to be considered eligible for the project

### Bid Submission

- Bids must be submitted in accordance with the Instructions to Bidders (IB06)
- Late submissions will not be considered

By submitting a bid, the bidder acknowledges that they have read and understood the tender requirements, and that they are prepared to execute a binding contract.

---

Note: I did not include some of the irrelevant data, such as the GDN content. Inform me if you would like me to add it in.  Also the attachments were formatted in such a way to maximize readability, inform me if there is anything else I should change.   Let
